about_the_game:
Enter The Labyrinth is a single player action rpg that takes place in a world abandoned by its god during an apocalyptic event, a never ending rainstorm that eventually flooded the planet, forcing survivors to sail the oceans searching for a rumored last piece of land, a mysterious island, where an ancient Labyrinth exists, leading survivor's to a new world called Paradise.



The intense gameplay focuses on weapon based combat using classic elements like swords and shields but with a heavy emphasis on weapon colliding, armor breaking, and cutting of flesh. Weapons have weight and with this consideration, when you swing, matters.



Explore the island, outside and within the dungeon for valuable loot, mighty weapons and armors. Face demons and fight warriors in battles that all feel like boss battles. Every battle matters. Every attack matters. Navigating through the Labyrinth will involve some metroidvanian exploration aspects.



Directional attacks allow you to specifically target where to attack. Exposing weak points to make kills easier. Or swing against an attack to parry and defend.



As you explore the Labyrinth and The Island, you'll find unique weapons and powerful armours which matter. A single strike to the head can be the end for the hero, so equipping helmets for example, are the difference between life and death when you do get caught with a strike. A natural approach to difficulty. This wont be a simple, easy , Journey....



Now in development. Help support the project by wishlisting and following the development updates on twitter.

content_descriptors.notes: The game's mechanics involve impale and cutting of flesh of humans and creatures. Blood is used frequently. No extreme guts and gore, although cutting of body parts does happen.

name: Enter The Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz/ AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940

short_description: Labyrinth is an intense close ranged hack n slash focused on steel vs steel action in deep and deadly battles against nightmarish demons within a mysterious labyrinth that promises to lead triumphant warriors off their dying world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
